english.segment1: Whats going on tonight? Is everything all right?. I hope that nothings wrong I haven't seen you in so long. I'm away you're here to stay and I'm away and you're ok. You're here to stay and I'm away you're here to stay and I'm ok. What exactly do you do when I'm not with you?. What exactly do you say all the time that I'm away?. Tell me nothings wrong. Seems like I've been gone oh so long. Nothing seems to have changed. Yet the familiar things seem all so strange
